alert.note: Alert for Albany; Columbia; Greene; Rensselaer; Saratoga; Schenectady; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 4:12PM EDT until May 16 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ulster County in east central New York... Schenectady County in east central New York... Western Columbia County in east central New York... Albany County in east central New York... Eastern Greene County in east central New York... Southeastern Saratoga County in east central New York... Western Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 412 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Duanesburg to near Feura Bush to Milton to near Sheffield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Scotia, Hudson, Mechanicville, Catskill, Saugerties, Delmar, Latham, Guilderland, Niskayuna and Duanesburg. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Albany; Columbia; Greene; Rensselaer; Saratoga; Schenectady; Ulster
